atDirectives.name: @tailwind
atDirectives.description: Use the @tailwind directive to insert Tailwind's base, components, utilities, and variants styles.

atDirectives.name: @apply
atDirectives.description: Use @apply to inline any existing utility classes.

atDirectives.name: @layer
atDirectives.description: Use @layer to define custom styles within Tailwind's layers.

atDirectives.name: @config
atDirectives.description: Use @config to specify a custom Tailwind config file.
